reviewText: From a nudity/hot chick/sexy standpoint, this one is OK. Not bad, not great. Leading lady Daneen Boone is a hot one, but could have used more full-frontal scenes. Actually the whole movie could have used more, and that might have made up a little for my next point, which is that the plot is a convoluted mess that I NEVER could figure out. Flashbacks, daydream sequences, fantasy stories--it's all so blended up together and jumps around so much that I don't know how anybody really could follow along. The acting is predictably bad, the production values solid (for this genre), but the writing and direction are atrocious.
DANEEN Is So Hot Who Cares If The Plot Is Lame. Get To A Lot Of Skin. Simply Stunning!!

Although the plot line is a little silly, Daneen Boone is one of the prettiest women that I have ever seen! In Seduction of Innocence, Daneen plays a spoiled girl in an all-girl school that has fantasies about her professor. It is not until the end of the movie that I realized that the kidnapping and treasure hunts were all part of a young girl's fantasies! I found the sex scenes to be tame and a pleasure to watch. I have no idea what else Daneen Boone has starred in but I do plan to check them out!

Mike Serovey

Daneen Boone (Justine) is portrayed as a nieve, overly-protected student at an all girls school, where she is kidnapped in the shower by professional thieves looking for lost treasures. Under a hypnotic  influence, Justine reveals her wild exotic voyeuristic adventures which  have occured around the world. Her provacative fantasies are descriptive  and visually leave nothing to the imagination. Justine's sensual adventures  display how she is overcomed by seduction and gradually loses her  innocence, finding sexual freedom and love through her voyeuristic  journeys. The plot has been sacrificed for an abundant amount of nudity.  The film is a soft-porn flick, however Daneen Boone is a fresh young face  and beautiful to admire.
